title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Ade Oladipo and Jake Paul stop by
itunes:title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Ade Oladipo and Jake Paul stop by
description:
Chris is joined in LA by Ade Oladipo, who is part of the broadcast team that will be calling Ryan Garcia - Javier Fortuna. Ade breaks down that fight and what we can and should expect from Garcia. They also dive into the latest with Jake Paul and if he wins his upcoming fight, who should he consider fighting next. Later, Jake Paul sits down with Chris to talk about his upcoming fight with Hasim Rahman Jr., and if he wins that, Chris has an idea of what former champion he should look to get in the ring with next. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
